events.name: Life cycle inventory creation and analysis for three battery types
events.wd_label: Life cycle inventory creation and analysis for three battery types
events.wd_description: Life cycle inventories (LCIs) are created for three battery types and their respective supply chains based on the goal and scope definition. The inventories are derived from various models and data sources to analyze material flows and energy demand.
events.description: Life cycle inventories (LCIs) are created for three battery types and their respective supply chains based on the goal and scope definition. The inventories are derived from various models and data sources to analyze material flows and energy demand.

events.name: Goal and scope definition
events.wd_description: The goal and scope of the study are defined to create life cycle inventories for three battery types and their supply chains.
events.description: The goal and scope of the study are defined to create life cycle inventories for three battery types and their supply chains.

events.name: BatPac 5.0 model
events.wd_description: The composition of the battery cells is based on the BatPac 5.0 model.
events.description: The composition of the battery cells is based on the BatPac 5.0 model.

events.name: GREET 2021 model
events.wd_description: The GREET 2021 model is used for the composition and energy demand of the positive active materials.
events.description: The GREET 2021 model is used for the composition and energy demand of the positive active materials.

events.name: Engels et al. inventories
events.wd_description: The inventories for the negative active material are based on Engels et al.
events.description: The inventories for the negative active material are based on Engels et al.

events.name: Data sources for materials and energy flows
events.wd_label: Data sources for materials and energy flows
events.wd_description: The materials and energy flow data for components and cell production are derived from various studies and databases, with specific data for lithium hydroxide routes from Schenker et al. and Chordia et al.
events.description: The materials and energy flow data for components and cell production are derived from various studies and databases, with specific data for lithium hydroxide routes from Schenker et al. and Chordia et al.

events.name: Ecoinvent database
events.wd_description: The activities of raw material extraction and processing are based on the ecoinvent database.
events.description: The activities of raw material extraction and processing are based on the ecoinvent database.

events.name: Schenker et al. data
events.wd_description: Data for specific locations for lithium extraction and processing are based on Schenker et al.
events.description: Data for specific locations for lithium extraction and processing are based on Schenker et al.

events.name: Chordia et al. data
events.wd_description: Data for specific locations for lithium extraction and processing are based on Chordia et al.
events.description: Data for specific locations for lithium extraction and processing are based on Chordia et al.

events.name: Scenarios with adapted supply chains
events.wd_description: Three scenarios with adapted supply chains are investigated to analyze the influence of location on battery cell production, positive active material production, and different production routes for lithium hydroxide.
events.description: Three scenarios with adapted supply chains are investigated to analyze the influence of location on battery cell production, positive active material production, and different production routes for lithium hydroxide.

events.name: Location influence scenario
events.wd_description: The influence of location on battery cell production is analyzed by assuming 100% production in one of eight countries.
events.description: The influence of location on battery cell production is analyzed by assuming 100% production in one of eight countries.

events.name: Positive active material production scenario
events.wd_description: The influence of location on positive active material production is analyzed for NMC811, NCA, and LFP batteries.
events.description: The influence of location on positive active material production is analyzed for NMC811, NCA, and LFP batteries.

events.name: NMC811 production locations
events.wd_description: NMC811 is produced in China, South Korea, Japan, Europe, and other regions.
events.description: NMC811 is produced in China, South Korea, Japan, Europe, and other regions.

events.name: NCA production locations
events.wd_description: NCA is produced in Japan, South Korea, China, and other regions.
events.description: NCA is produced in Japan, South Korea, China, and other regions.

events.name: LFP production locations
events.wd_description: LFP is produced in China, Canada, and the USA.
events.description: LFP is produced in China, Canada, and the USA.

events.name: Lithium hydroxide production routes scenario
events.wd_description: The influence of different production routes for lithium hydroxide is analyzed for Australia, Chile, and China.
events.description: The influence of different production routes for lithium hydroxide is analyzed for Australia, Chile, and China.

events.name: Baseline scenario results and environmental impact
events.wd_label: Baseline scenario results and environmental impact
events.wd_description: The baseline scenario results show that LFP batteries are favorable from an environmental perspective, while NCA batteries have the highest environmental indicator scores. There are trade-offs between different sustainability dimensions and impact categories.
events.description: The baseline scenario results show that LFP batteries are favorable from an environmental perspective, while NCA batteries have the highest environmental indicator scores. There are trade-offs between different sustainability dimensions and impact categories.

events.name: LFP battery environmental impact
events.wd_description: LFP batteries are favorable from an environmental perspective and also in terms of cost.
events.description: LFP batteries are favorable from an environmental perspective and also in terms of cost.

events.name: NCA battery environmental impact
events.wd_description: NCA batteries have the highest environmental indicator scores in the baseline scenario.
events.description: NCA batteries have the highest environmental indicator scores in the baseline scenario.

events.name: Sustainability trade-offs
events.wd_description: There are trade-offs between impact categories of different sustainability dimensions, and even within the social dimension.
events.description: There are trade-offs between impact categories of different sustainability dimensions, and even within the social dimension.

events.name: Influence of location on sustainability dimensions
events.wd_label: Influence of location on sustainability dimensions
events.wd_description: The investigated scenarios show that location can significantly influence the results of all three sustainability dimensions, varying depending on the locations and processes considered.
events.description: The investigated scenarios show that location can significantly influence the results of all three sustainability dimensions, varying depending on the locations and processes considered.

events.name: Environmental impact
events.wd_description: The environmental impact of battery production varies significantly based on the location of the production facilities.
events.description: The environmental impact of battery production varies significantly based on the location of the production facilities.

events.name: Social impact
events.wd_description: The social impact of battery production also varies depending on the location, with different countries having different social implications.
events.description: The social impact of battery production also varies depending on the location, with different countries having different social implications.

events.name: Economic impact
events.wd_description: The economic impact of battery production is influenced by the location, affecting costs and investment returns.
events.description: The economic impact of battery production is influenced by the location, affecting costs and investment returns.
